Bio

I am an undergraduate Computer Science and Mathematics student at Hofstra University with a passion for solving interesting problems and creating value. Currently, I am diving into the world of ML and distributed systems. Recently, I have been a SWE Intern @ Optimum's Platform Engineering Team, developing a testing automation framework for Stream devices. I am exploring computer science internships and opportunities in these areas. If you'd like to chat, reach out to me on LinkedIn or at jprasad1@pride.hofstra.edu

Projects

  • ML
GCN Node Classification Code
Optimized a two-layer Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) model using PyTorch for node classification, achieving 81% accuracy on the Cora Dataset
Gateway Status Image Classifier
Achieved 3rd place in Optimum Winter 2024 A.I. Hackathon by developing an image classification system with Vertex AI for gateway status monitoring, achieving a 95.5% precision rate.
GCN Node Classification Code
